premise_source_doc_sentence: Ghostbusters  (  also known as Ghostbusters : Answer the Call and marketed as such on home release  )  is a 2016 3D supernatural comedy film directed by Paul Feig , written by Feig and Katie Dippold and starring Melissa McCarthy , Kristen Wiig , Kate McKinnon , Leslie Jones and Chris Hemsworth .

claim: Paul Feig worked with Melissa McCarthy on a cruise ship.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Starring Melissa McCarthy , Jason Statham , Rose Byrne , Miranda Hart , Bobby Cannavale , Allison Janney , and Jude Law , the film follows the transformation of desk-bound CIA analyst Susan Cooper  (  McCarthy  )  into a field agent who attempts to foil the black market sale of a suitcase nuke .
